intro: Argostemma linearifolium, commonly known as the slender-leaf argostemma, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its narrow, lance-shaped leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Argostemma linearifolium is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
